thread.title: Our favourite Paris hotel
thread.title_full: Our favourite Paris hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN De Neuville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: frequent_holidays
title: Our favourite Paris hotel
text: This was our second stay, and the hotel was just as good as last time. Even with all the redecorating work going on, it managed to be a relaxing charming place. Very comfortable newly decorated room, and all the staff friendly and helpful. It's also really well located, in a lovely area, and handy for metro and trains. Would have been 5 stars all round, but took one off as there wasn't much room to hang up clothes. Not a big problem.
